name: alexa-suggest-movie
description: The Alexa Skills that will suggest movies based on your mood

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ 2> /dev/null && mkdir dist && zip_path="dist/moveme-lambda.zip" && echo "Zip to: $zip_path" && zip -9 -q -r $zip_path package.json index.js index.test.js src/ node_modules/ && du -k "$zip_path"
scripts.test.zip: npm run build && cd dist && unzip alexa-suggest-movie_*.zip && ../node_modules/.bin/mocha ../src/.mocha.js '**/*.test.js' && cd ../ && rm -rf dist

author: DiUS Computing PTY
